original_text:
Make yourselves bald and cut off your hair,
    for the children of your delight;
make yourselves as bald as the eagle,
    for they shall go from you into exile.
korean_text: 너는 네 기뻐하는 자식으로 인하여 네 머리털을 깎아 대머리 같게 할지어다 네 머리가 크게 벗어지게 하기를 독수리 같게 할지어다 이는 그들이 사로잡혀 너를 떠났음이라

sentences.original_text: for the children of your delight
make yourselves as bald as the eagle
for they shall go from you into exile
